completedItems.title: fix: agent deletion
completedItems.body:
Currently, we cannot delete an agent if they own worlds, because it causes a foreign key constraint error on the logs table (logs_roomId_rooms_id_fk).

This PR fixes the issue by first checking for an existing agent to reassign the worlds

completedItems.title: feat: scopable knowledge
completedItems.body:
Right now, knowledge is memories scoped to the agent's UUID, so global only

This PR allows knowledge to be searchable by entityId, worldId, or roomId
